task.title: View Time Punch Activity
task.shortdesc: The Activity page lists all geofence punch activity for a specified date range.

step.cmd: Select the range of activity (day, week, month, or custom).
Depending on the range, select the day, week (current or previous), month, or start and end dates.
Select List or Map to view the punch activity.

info.note: If you select Show Filters, you can view the activity by team, employee name, or employee number.

step.info: The map view shows green and red dots. A green dot indicates that the punch is within the employeeâ€™s assigned fence. A red dot indicates that the punch is outside the assigned fence or the employee is not assigned to that fence. Select a dot to view punch details, including employee name and number, work date and time, punch type, latitude, and longitude, and any issues.
